name: Escort Commander
description: Escort Commander is an arcade space shooter blended with strategic and tactical gameplay elements. This is not another mindless shooter. Build your fleet. Outfit your colony. Upgrade your ship. Defend the last colony. Survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 250 MB available space
